definition: poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly

sentences.english: We think Astro Soichi would have made a great roommate.
sentences.chinese: 我們覺得屋子裏有宇航員野口聰一作伴一定其樂無窮。

sentences.english: Undulator oar, boating on the lake, Fun for all at.
sentences.chinese: 凌波盪槳，泛舟湖上，其樂無窮。

sentences.english: It's (It is) fun to visit the museum and its neighboring shopping malls.
sentences.chinese: 到博物館及它的鄰近購物中心旅遊其樂無窮。

sentences.english: Well, there is an ice skating rink which is fun for everybody.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，那兒有個對每個人來說都其樂無窮的溜冰場。

sentences.english: Interacting with dream people is a lot of fun.
sentences.chinese: 和有夢想的人溝通其樂無窮。

sentences.english: Great scenery, all recorded by the share, is a very happy thing.
sentences.chinese: 大好河山，盡收相機，與衆分享，其樂無窮。

sentences.english: And they are lots of fun to play with.
sentences.chinese: 跟它們在一起玩其樂無窮。

definition: lit. if it's wrong, it's wrong (idiom); to make the best after a mistake/to accept an error and adapt to it/to muddle through
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
lit. don't fight, won't make friends (idiom); an exchange of blows may lead to friendship/no discord, no concord
to regret not having met earlier (idiom); It is nice to meet you finally./It feels like we have known each other all along.
lit. two segments with a single cut (idiom)/fig. to make a clean break (idiom)
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
to trust one another fully/to treat sb with sincerity
lit. wading in mud and water/a slovenly job/sloppy
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
